reasons.description: Patient does not have required condition: atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease
reasons.details: The study required patients to have atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease

reasons.description: Patient is not on required medication: statin therapy
reasons.details: The study required patients to be taking statin therapy

paperSummary.intervention: evolocumab (either 140 mg every 2 weeks or 420 mg monthly)
paperSummary.primaryEndpoint: composite of cardiovascular death, myocardial infarction, stroke, hospitalization for unstable angina, or coronary revascularization
paperSummary.population: Patients with atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease and LDL cholesterol levels of 70 mg per deciliter (1.8 mmol per liter) or higher who were receiving statin therapy.
